医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
MRI 连接组预测早期帕金森病的灰质萎缩进展根据北美放射学会 (RSNA) 期刊《放射学》今天发表的一项研究，MRI 显示的大脑结构和功能组织可以预测早期轻度帕金森病患者脑萎缩的进展情况）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/MRI-connectome-predicts-gray-matter-atropy-progression-in-early-Parkinsons-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/MRI-connectome-predicts-gray-matter-atropy-progression-in-early-Parkinsons-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d950ef2-b7dd-4098-ba0b-95213565cf8c Tue, 25 Jun 2024 11:25:28 -0400 MRI connectome predicts gray matter atrophy progression in early Parkinson's disease
Sapio Sciences 推出 Sapio GMP LIMS，为独特的制造工艺提供无与伦比的灵活性https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Sapio-Sciences-Introduces-Sapio-GMP-LIMS-Offering-Unmatched-Flexibility-for-Unique-Manufacturing-Processes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Sapio-Sciences-Introduces-Sapio-GMP-LIMS-Offering-Unmatched-Flexibility-for-Unique-Manufacturing-Processes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2ea830cd-e640-4dcb-952b-92c9432556b3 Tue, 25 Jun 2024 11:18:00 -0400 Sapio Sciences Introduces Sapio GMP LIMS Offering Unmatched Flexibility for Unique Manufacturing Processes
结肠的单图像 3D 建模可以实现快速疾病诊断科学家仅使用胶囊内窥镜相机拍摄的单张图像就成功创建了结肠的三维模型。这种新方法提供了更好的图像，可以帮助专家更快地检测疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Single-image-3D-modeling-of-the-colon-can-enable-rapid-disease-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Single-image-3D-modeling-of-the-colon-can-enable-rapid-disease-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5f0c1842-a714-48a1-a160-1df75e06c7e6 Tue, 25 Jun 2024 11:17:35 -0400 Single-image 3D modeling of the colon can enable rapid disease diagnosis
新的 MDMA 变体可能成为安全心理治疗应用的有希望的替代品使用活性成分 3,4-亚甲二氧基-N-甲基苯丙胺 (MDMA)（俗称“摇头丸”）支持创伤后应激障碍等精神疾病的心理治疗正在全世界范围内进行讨论。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/New-MDMA-variants-could-be-promising-alternatives-for-safe-psychotherapeutic-applications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/New-MDMA-variants-could-be-promising-alternatives-for-safe-psychotherapeutic-applications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bbd9a4e6-9bf3-4791-a2da-f4aa3b57af81 Tue, 25 Jun 2024 11:05:00 -0400 New MDMA variants could be promising alternatives for safe psychotherapeutic applications
睡眠模式揭示隐藏的健康线索您的睡眠追踪器可能会为您提供的信息不仅仅是您的睡眠信息，具体而言，它可能会为您提供有关糖尿病和睡眠呼吸暂停等慢性病以及 COVID-19 等疾病的信息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Sleep-patterns-reveal-hidden-health-clues.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Sleep-patterns-reveal-hidden-health-clues.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bbe2148f-c567-41e7-aa3f-0f7c5cf02376 Tue, 25 Jun 2024 10:58:12 -0400 Sleep patterns reveal hidden health clues
FDA 扩大 Roswell Park 脑癌免疫疗法的孤儿药资格认定美国食品和药物管理局 (FDA) 扩大了 SurVaxM 的孤儿药资格，SurVaxM 是一种脑癌免疫疗法，诞生于罗斯威尔公园综合癌症中心的实验室。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/FDA-expands-orphan-drug-designation-for-Roswell-Parks-brain-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/FDA-expands-orphan-drug-designation-for-Roswell-Parks-brain-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7d3363cf-9290-48c8-b352-52d6d63cbfca Tue, 25 Jun 2024 10:52:36 -0400 FDA expands orphan drug designation for Roswell Park's brain cancer immunotherapy
SPT Labtech 和 Olink 宣布推出新的自动化解决方案，利用 Olink 下一代蛋白质组学技术加速研究https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/SPT-Labtech-and-Olink-Announce-New-Automated-Solution-to-Accelerate-Research-with-Olink-Next-Generation-Proteomics-Technology。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/SPT-Labtech-and-Olink-Announce-New-Automated-Solution-to-Accelerate-Research-with-Olink-Next-Generation-Proteomics-Technology。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb14610e-d6be-4405-a925-cc3159599d6e Tue, 25 Jun 2024 10:44:00 -0400 SPT Labtech and Olink Announce New Automated Solution to Accelerate Research with Olink Next Generation Proteomics Technology
使用语音和机器学习自动预测阿尔茨海默病的进展试图弄清楚某人是否患有阿尔茨海默病通常需要进行一系列评估——访谈、脑成像、血液和脑脊液测试。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Automated-prediction-of-Alzheimers-disease-progression-using-speech-and-machine-learning.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Automated-prediction-of-Alzheimers-disease-progression-using-speech-and-machine-learning.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32a383fb-64fa-48ed-a635-5888433aeb38 Tue, 25 Jun 2024 09:25:06 -0400 Automated prediction of Alzheimer's disease progression using speech and machine learning
非洲血统的人的遗传变异与糖尿病并发症的风险增加有关根据 6 月 25 日发表在《自然医学》杂志上的一份报告，非洲血统人群中常见的一种遗传变异与糖尿病并发症（包括糖尿病视网膜病变）的风险增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Genetic-variation-in-people-of-African-ancestry-linked-to-increased-risk-of-diabetes-complications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Genetic-variation-in-people-of-African-ancestry-linked-to-increased-risk-of-diabetes-complications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=649eb265-0e59-473c-8858-3adcb1d92af6 Tue, 25 Jun 2024 09:15:06 -0400 Genetic variation in people of African ancestry linked to increased risk of diabetes complications
植物来源的硝酸盐可降低死亡风险埃迪斯科文大学 (ECU) 的新研究发现，植物来源的硝酸盐与较低的死亡风险相关，而来自动物性食品、加工肉类和自来水等其他来源的硝酸盐则与较高的死亡风险相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Nitrate-from-plant-sources-linked-to-lower-risk-of-mortality.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Nitrate-from-plant-sources-linked-to-lower-risk-of-mortality.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ac82563-268c-410d-afc2-c9750c37148e Tue, 25 Jun 2024 09:03:20 -0400 Nitrate from plant sources linked to lower risk of mortality
